text: My Side of the Mountain is a 1969 Canadian family adventure movie directed by James B. Clark and was based on the 1959 novel of the same name by Jean Craighead George. It stars Ted Eccles, Theodore Bikel, Tudi Wiggins, Paul HÃ©rbert, Cosette Lee, Ralph Endersby and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == References == ==Other websites== * * My Side of the Mountain Site Category:1969 adventure movies Category:1960s family movies Category:Canadian family movies Category:Canadian adventure movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Quebec
title: My Side of the Mountain (movie)
